snippet: Michael Kors Holdings, known for its trendy handbags and watches, said it expected margins to shrink for the year as it invested more to open stores in Europe.
abstract: Michael Kors Holdings says it expects margins to shrink for the year as it invests more to open stores in Europe and increases number of shops it has in department stores.
lead_paragraph: Michael Kors Holdings, known for its trendy handbags and watches, said it expected margins to shrink for the year as it invested more to open stores in Europe.

headline.main: Sales Up at Michael Kors, but Margins Are Tightening
headline.print_headline: Sales Up at Michael Kors, but Margins Are Tightening
